sign_in_desc:
Have full controll
of your time and planning
first_slide_desc: Take notes anywhere and access them from different platforms. planMe is always ready!
second_slide_desc: planMe always brings you weekly updates so you're always safe and with the best and new features. We are always listening to our users!
third_slide_desc: We are building planMe with the best of our users requests. We want to create everyday the best app and space for you!
title: Title
confir_delete: Do you really want to delete this note?
send_back: Put it back into my notes
delete_warning: This note will be permanently deleted and you will not be able to recover it!
empty: Here will be your archived notes.
archived: Here will be your archived notes
